rules.description: Hate speech must be flagged. Includes slurs, hate symbols, or content targeting protected groups.
criteria: Contains any slur from the hate_speech_slur_list
Contains any symbol from the hate_symbol_list (e.g., swastika, SS)
Targets a protected group (race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, disability) with derogatory language

allowed: I read a historical article about the Holocaust.

rules.rationale: Hate speech incites discrimination or violence and is disallowed by law and community standards.

rules.description: Harassment is prohibited. Repeated personal attacks, threats, or intimidation.
criteria: Contains a threat of physical or psychological harm
Contains repeated insults or demeaning remarks toward the same individual
Contains language that signifies intimidation or coercion

allowed: I disagree with your opinion, but I respect your right to hold it.
prohibited: You are a worthless loser. Get lost!
I will kill you if you don't leave me alone.

rules.rationale: Harassment undermines user safety and community trust.

rules.description: Explicit content is disallowed. Includes nudity, graphic sexual acts, or extreme violence.
criteria: Contains any depiction of nudity or sexual activity beyond a minimal context
Contains graphic descriptions or images of violence (beatings, gore, torture)
Contains pornographic language or sexual arousal content

allowed: Medical illustration of human anatomy for educational purposes.
A short clip of a surgery for a medical lecture.
prohibited: Full frontal nudity for sexual arousal.
Graphic gore with explicit details of dismemberment.

rules.rationale: Explicit content can be illegal, psychologically damaging, and violates community norms.

exceptions.condition: Content is part of an academic, historical, or journalistic context with proper attribution and no intent to incite.
exceptions.rationale: Allows legitimate educational or documentary discussions of hateful content.

exceptions.condition: User is responding defensively in a self‑reporting scenario or whistle‑blowing context.
exceptions.rationale: Protects users from retaliation while still discouraging harassment.

exceptions.condition: Explicit content is used for medical, scientific, or artistic education with clear context and no gratuitous detail.
exceptions.rationale: Supports legitimate learning and artistic expression while preventing exploitation.

test_cases.message: I read a historical article about the Holocaust.
I will kill you if you don't leave me alone.
Full frontal nudity for sexual arousal.
Medical illustration of human anatomy for educational purposes.
